title: Upgraded Ground-floor 2-bedroom/2-bathroom condo with Bonus Den
posting_body: ['•••1 pending application', 'Tastefully upgraded 2-bed/2-bath+Den ground-floor condo for rent in Silverado Ranch right next to community pool.', 'Popular community just minutes from shopping, restaurants, schools and quick drive to the airport and LV Strip.', 'Open floor plan with plush carpeting, neutral colors, ceiling fans and a bonus den that could be used as 3rd bedroom.', 'Lovely kitchen with breakfast bar, pantry, laminate countertops and all appliances.', 'Spacious master suite with walk-in closet, dual vanities and tub/shower combo in bathroom.', 'Balcony with smaller storage room and views of the community.', 'Washer/dryer in laundry room.', 'Guest bedroom has full bath with shower.', '>>>', 'Amenities include 2 community pools with spa and a clubhouse with exercise room.', '1-year lease ***Small pets considered.', 'Available now!', 'Rent: $1,495/mo.', 'Security deposit: $1,300', 'Cleaning deposit: $300', 'Pet deposit: $500/pet', 'App.fee: $85/applicant   (3x rent income, clean rental history & 600+ credit score)', 'For more information or to schedule a showing please contact Laszlo at', 'show contact info', 'Showings available Mo-Sat by appointment', 'Henderson - Green Valley area buyer/leasing specialist', 'American Realty and Property Management', 'Lic# 170610', '**If you get my voicemail, please leave a detailed message.', 'Thank you', 'Keyword: Silverado 2-bed+Office']
